channel.title: Chess inside of black mesa files?
channel.description:
I was searching the files in the steam release of black mesa and found some files under platform/Addons that deal with checkers, chess, common, GO, hearts, and spades. They also all have text files that deal with the general game its located in. I don't know if anyone else has talked about this yet so I figured I might as well put these up to see if anyone can figure out that these are for
![Chess confirmed.png|568x210](upload://nh7t52W8pGFQEEupdt0XoQP2zQj.png)
